item.description: <p>Ideal for cold-weather training or work outdoors, the Chaz Hoodie promises superior warmth with every wear. item.title: Teton Pullover Hoodie-XS-Black
item.description: <p>This Teton Pullover Hoodie gives you more than laid-back style. It's equipped with moisture-wicking fabric to keep light and dry inside, especially in chilly-weather workouts. An elasticized hem lets you move about freely.</p> <p>• Black pullover hoodie.<br />• Soft, brushed interior. <br />• Front hand pockets. <br />• Machine wash/dry.</p>

item.title: Frankie Sweatshirt-XS-Green
item.description: <p>The Frankie Sweatshirt is your best friend at long afternoon stadium stints or winter trailside campsites. The soft fleece fabric keeps you toasty as moisture-wicking technology kicks in when the sun comes out.</p> <p>• Light green crewneck sweatshirt.<br />• Hand pockets.<br />• Relaxed fit.<br />• Machine wash/dry.</p>

item.title: Hollister Backyard Sweatshirt-XS-Green
item.description: <p>Kick off your weekend in the Hollister Backyard Sweatshirt. Whether you're raking leaves or flipping burgers, this comfy layer blocks the bite of the crisp autumn air. Puffy thick from hood to hem, it traps heat against your core.</p> <p>• Cream crewneck sweatshirt with navy sleeves/trim.<br />• Relaxed fit. <br />• Ribbed cuffs and hem. <br />• Machine wash/dry.</p>

Not only does it have top-notch moisture-wicking abilities, but the tight-weave fabric also prevents pilling from repeated wash-and-wear cycles.</p> <p>• Mint striped full zip hoodie.<br />• 100% bonded polyester fleece.<br />• Pouch pocket.<br />• Rib cuffs and hem. <br />• Machine washable.&l

item.title: Marco Lightweight Active Hoodie-XS-Blue
item.description: <p>For cold-weather training or post-game layering, you need something more than a basic fleece. Our Marco Lightweight Active Hoodie brings both style and performance to the plate, court, or touchline. The smooth-faced, brushed-back fabric blocks wind and traps body heat, while integrated Cocona® fibers pull moisture away.</p> <p>• Light blue heather full zip hoodie.<br />• Fitted flatlock seams.<br />• Matching lining and drawstring. <br />

item.title: Beaumont Summit Kit-XS-Orange
item.description: <p>The smooth nylon shell around the Beaumont Summit Kit combats wind, reinforced with a cold-fighting brushed fleece layer. The jacket is reversible, giving you a new look for the return trek. Ample pocket space rounds out this hiker's paradise package.</p> <p>• Yellow full zip rain jacket.<br />• Full-zip front. <br />• Stand-up collar. <br />• Elasticized cuffs. <br />• Machine wash/dry.</p>

item.title: Hyperion Elements Jacket-XS-Green
item.description: <p>Boldly face high winds, frigid temps and stormy weather the whole winter through in the Hyperion Elements Jacket. LumaTech™ insulating technology helps maintain your core temperature and wick sweat. The smooth shell is water repellent and quilted to retain body heat.</p> <p>• Lime 1/4 zip pullover.<br />• Split pocket. <br />• Thumb holes. <br />• Machine wash/hang to dry.</p>

item.title: Kenobi Trail Jacket-XS-Black
item.description: <p>Aside from sealed seams to keep moisture out and body heat in, the Kenobi Trail Vest is all about media convenience. Use your phone and music player without ever taking it out of its cozy compartment: an attached remote on the left chest lets you change songs, pause and raise/lower volume.</p> <p>• Black 1/4 zip pullover with royal zipper. <br />• Adjustable hood and sleeve cuffs. <br />• Machine wash/air dry.</p>

Use your phone and music player without ever taking it out of its cozy compartment: an attached remote on the left chest lets you change songs, pause and raise/lower volume.</p> <p>• Black 1/4 zip pullover with royal zipper. <br />• Adjustable hood and sleeve cuffs. <br />• Machine wash/air dry.</p>

item.description: <p>The Lando Gym Jacket offers strategic ventilation at perspiration-prone areas, while moisture-wicking technology helps you stay dry. Side-seam pockets house your favorite media device, so you're plugged in when working out.</p> <p>• Gray polyester/spandex full zip jacket with orange lining. <br />• Right pocket device storage.<br />• Cocona® performance fabric. <br />• Machine wash/dry.</p>

item.description: <p>The Mars HeatTech™ Jacket defense against winter climes so you can play offense in the park, on the trail or in the deck chair. item.title: Proteus Fitness Jackshirt-XS-Black
item.description: <p>Part jacket, part shirt, the Proteus Fitness Jackshirt makes an ideal companion for outdoor training, camping or loafing on crisp days. Natural Cocona® technology brings breathable comfort and increased dryness along with UV protection and odor management. The drop-tail hem provides extra coverage when you're riding a bike or replacing a sink valve.</p> <p>• 1/4 zip. Stand-up collar. <br />• Machine wash/dry.<br />• Quilted inner layer.&lt

The drop-tail hem provides extra coverage when you're riding a bike or replacing a sink valve.</p> <p>• 1/4 zip. Stand-up collar. <br />• Machine wash/dry.<br />• Quilted inner layer.&lt

item.title: Helios EverCool™ Tee-XS-Black

Our mesh Helio Training Tank is crafted from super-soft, ultra-lightweight fabric that stretches in all directions to follow your every move, on mat, court or street.</p> <p>• Blue heather tank with gray pocket.<br />• Contrast sides and back inserts.<br />• Self-fabric binding at neck and armholes. <br />• Machine wash/dry.</p>

With its thin fleece interior and smooth layer-friendly surface, you'll get all the comfort and versatility you need.</p> <p>• Smooth exterior for easy over-layering.<br />• Brushed fleece interior insulates and wicks. <br />• No-roll elastic waistband with inner drawstring.<br />• Chafe-resistant flatlock seams.</p>

item.description: <p>It's not often that your pants work as a yoga staple and a climbing buddy. The Livingston All-Purpose Tight is made with soft, 11% cotton and nylon polymer stretch construction that lets you find the right angle in the studio or on the mountain side.</p> <p>• Breathable stretch organic cotton/spandex.<br />• Compression fit<br />• Hidden key pocket<br />• Elastic waist with internal drawcord.</p>

item.title: Cobalt CoolTech™ Fitness Short-32-Black
item.description: <p>It's not rocket surgery: the hotter your conditions, the more you need to stay cool. That's why the Cobalt CoolTech™ Fitness Short features built-in technology and side perforations that keep you ventilated and comfortable for the distance. The elastic waist promises a personalized fit.</p> <p>• Light blue nylon shorts.<br />• Relaxed fit. <br />• 5" inseam. <br />• Machine wash/dry.</p>

item.title: Helena Hooded Fleece-XS-Blue
item.description: <p>Wear this hoodie after the gym or before a chilly weather bike ride. Either way, this versatile sweatshirt offers an effortlessly appealing silhouette and a super-comfy fit. Smooth, stretchy fabric creates flattering shape, while the full-zip placket and hood help block gusty winds.</p> <p>Full zip. <br />Banded cuffs and waist. <br />Front pockets. <br />Machine wash/dry.</p>

item.title: Eos V-Neck Hoodie-XS-Blue
item.description: <p>Getting chilly before class starts? Wear the Eos on your way to and from yoga for a cute and cozy warmup piece. Reach for its reliable comfort and enjoy a super-soft blend of fabrics finished in sporty style that includes a hidden kangaroo pocket.</p> <p>Semi-fitted. <br />Long-Sleeve. <br />Machine wash/line dry.</p>

item.title: Circe Hooded Ice Fleece-XS-Gray
item.description: <p>Keep shivers at bay with the Circe Hooded Ice Fleece. Ultra-thick, high-pile fleece traps your body heat and keeps cold outside. The drawstring hood and ribbed details add extra coziness and touches of classic style. Its relaxed fit is loose enough to layer comfortably over your shirt.</p> <p>Full-zip front. <br />Three-panel hood. <br />Flatlock seams throughout. <br />Welt hand pockets. <br />Machine wash/dry.</p>

With striking color block contrast, fitted form and a built-in bra, you'll be supported and stylish at the same time.</p> <p>• Navy blue tank top - cotton.<br />• Feminine scoop neckline.<br />• Power mesh lining in shelf bra for superior support.<br />• Soft, breathable fabric.<br />• Dry wick fabric to stay cool and dry.</p>

item.title: Nona Fitness Tank-XS-Blue
item.description: <p>It doesn't matter if your goal is 5 miles or an hour of Vinyasa, because our Nona Fitness Tank does it all. You don't have to sacrifice either -- this v-neck top features smooth, chafe-free seams and a breathable mesh back insert. Cute, too.</p> <p>• Blue/white striped mesh tank.<br />• Relaxed fit. <br />• Chafe-resistant trim around armholes and collar. <br />• Machine wash/dry.</p>

item.title: Leah Yoga Top-XS-Orange
item.description: <p>The Leah Yoga Top offers a practical, comfortable upper that will not compromise your style. Body hugging fit and interior shelf bra make it suitable for active or leisure pursuits.</p> <p>• Blue heather rouched tank top.<br />• Camisole tank top.<br />• Banding and shirring details.<br />• Body hugging fit.<br />• Contrast topstitch.<br />• Interior shelf bra with shapewear technology.<br />• 65% Polyest

item.title: Portia Capri-28-Blue
item.description: <p>From yoga at dawn to evenings curled up with a book, our Portia Capri gives you the comfort and freedom to cruise through the day. The high-waisted design keeps you covered while you're bending and stretching, while contrast stripes promise a dash of sporty style.</p> <p>• Salmon heather capri sweats.<br />• Relaxed fit, high waist. <br />• Inseam: 21". <br />• Wide elastic waistband. <br />• Machine wash/dry.</p&
